text.text:
Our international management team 
is directed by hand-picked leaders in 
their respective fields

text_image_advanced.description: Akhil leads the Content Services at TO THE NEW Digital. He has rich experience in digital video transformation and OTT publishing. Akhil has played an instrumental role in executing large VOD and near-live publishing projects including IPL, FIFA and distribution of video and metadata to a number of digital platforms.

text_image_advanced_492053831.description: Ashok leads and manages Analytics Services at TO THE NEW. He has been working very closely with global brands and agencies, helping them understand the benefits of social media monitoring and analytics. He is a problem solver and people-first at heart. Ashok was also a co-founder of ThoughtBuzz, a social media analytics product.

text_image_advanced_1486476401.description: Atul is a veteran in communications and marketing and is currently spearheading business development at TO THE NEW Ventures. An expert in social media marketing, he is among the leading digital media professionals in India. Winner of many creative & biz awards, he was recently awarded the best social media professional in India.

text_image_advanced_1892177629.description: Atul is a veteran in communications and marketing and is currently spearheading business development at TO THE NEW Ventures. An expert in social media marketing, he is among the leading digital media professionals in India. Winner of many creative & biz awards, he was recently awarded the best social media professional in India.

text_image_advanced_1884641730.description: Dhruvank leads the finance and business development functions at TO THE NEW Ventures, parent company of TO THE NEW Digital. He also helps incubate products under TO THE NEW Ventures. He has extensive experience in media and consulting and has held executive positions in Star, NDTV, Turner, Deloitte Consulting and Accenture.

text_image_advanced_487180212.description: Leon leads the business development for TO THE NEW Digital in South East Asia. A serial entrepreneur, Leon has been involved in a number of web-related ventures which covered fields in social networking, web hosting, web solutions and e-commerce. Leon was also a co-founder of Techsailor.

text_image_advanced_1949523724.description: Narinder leads the Technology Services at TO THE NEW Digital. He is a strong proponent of Agile methodologies and is a Certified Scrum Master(CSM), Product Owner (CSPO), Certified Trainer for CSD (Certified Scrum Developer), Cloudera certified Apache Hadoop Developer and Data Analyst. He was also a co-founder of Inphina Technologies.

text_image_advanced_78556222.description: Narendra leads the digital marketing services at TO THE NEW. Narendra brings along with him a strong hold on business and marketing with even stronger analytical bent of mind.He has diverse experience ranging from software development to product development and marketing. He is a true digital evangelist and has assisted in building many brands and businesses.

text_image_advanced_114214191.description: Puneet is the co-founder and CEO of TO THE NEW Ventures, parent company of TO THE NEW Digital. He is a digital entrepreneur and an accomplished marketer. He was the founder of Tangerine Digital and has also held senior executive positions in Star, Fox International Channels, Reebok and Coca-Cola.

text_image_advanced_584776164.description: Raman leads Inside Sales & Marketing at TO THE NEW Digital. A highly analytics and numbers driven person, he has mastered the art and science of driving sales through digital marketing and inside sales. He was a co-founder of IntelliGrape and played an instrumental role in making it a global technology player.

text_image_advanced_1572938627.description: Rex leads and manages the business in Greater China region. He oversees the incubation of service lines and new products in the region. Prior to this, he co-founded a magazine company in Singapore and was involved in video streaming media business in the US.

text_image_advanced_924984414.description: Satya leads HR and Recruitment at TO THE NEW Digital. He is a master at hiring the "right" talent and has played a key role in setting up and flourishing people friendly culture at the company. Satya with his extensive experience in the field of Human Resources manages all matters related to our most precious resource i.e. our talent.

text_image_advanced_1907228283.description: Wayne leads and manages the business development and operations for TO THE NEW Digital in South East Asia. He oversees the growth and market leadership of the business in the region. Prior to this, he has been involved in a number of technology-related start-ups in Asia and the US and was also the co-founder of Tech Sailor.
